detail_desc: Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Founded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in an airy, patterned cotton weave that can also be tied as a hairband or around the neck. Size 60x60 cm.
Dressing gown in softly draping silk with a detachable tie belt at the waist and short sleeves with turn-ups.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, V-neck dress with a wrapover front, short flounced sleeves, a concealed fastening at the top and seam with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a soft brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, two chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Short-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey with a super-voluminous skirt in four layers of tulle. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a shimmering tone-on-tone elastic trim at the waist.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with sparkly stones at the top, padded shoulders and a concealed zip at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, loose-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and no buttons at the front.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, a zip at the top with a long tab, and a lined gusset. Lined at the front.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 3.1 cm.

Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with embroidery at the top and a V-shaped opening with narrow, twisted ties at the top. Elbow-length, raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and frill trimmed seams at the waist, hips and hem. Unlined.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with a lace-trimmed collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, a small flounce at the shoulders and a seam at the top with decorative gathers. Long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and leggings in organic cotton jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of the neck and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist and overlocked edges at the hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover at the front of the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Padded jacket designed for a small dog in woven fabric with a hook and loop fastening at the neck and a hole for a lead at the back of the neck. Hook and loop tab with a reflective detail. Fleece lining.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Diameter 2 cm.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Hooded cotton towel in velour with an all-over print on the front and a terry back. Hanger at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft, marled sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, press-studs at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
Pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sheen and a concealed zip with a button in one side. Lined.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, block heels and a zip in the side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx 7.5 cm.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a sewn-in bustier. Collar and buttons at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The bustier has a concealed press-stud at the front, flared peplum and elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless top in a fine knit with an open back and wide ties at the back of the hem. Ribbed trims around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Sequin-embroidered boots in faux fur with faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and button at the back, and seam with a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Long dress in airy, lightly crêped, softly draping chiffon. Flounce-trimmed V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the bottom and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and on the skirt to create tiers. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders, side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed button placket, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the shoulders, buttons at the front and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.
Polo-neck collar in a soft knit.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Oversized, double-breasted jacket in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and diagonal front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a rounded collar and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch viscose jersey with wide smocking at the top and short sleeves.

Short duffle coat in soft, felted fabric with toggle fastenings at the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. One inner pocket with a press-stud, and large patch front pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, empire-line dress in woven fabric with a square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim around the shoulders and at the hems. Gathered tier on the skirt for added width. Lined at the top.
Knitted jacket with a soft, thermal fleece inside. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

V-neck dress in a patterned viscose weave with covered buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a tie at the cuffs, and high slits at the front and sides. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Cotton slippers with elastication around the opening, terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles.
Lace blouse with buttons down the back and long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Round-necked T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Wide, cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the back and ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit.
Round-necked T-shirt in patterned slub cotton jersey.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front and front pockets. Lined.
Calf-length silk skirt with a waistband.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
